orsopy.fileio package¶

Submodules¶

orsopy.fileio.base module¶

Implementation of the base classes for the ORSO header.

class orsopy.fileio.base.Header[source]¶

Bases: object

The super class for all of the items in the orso module.

yaml()[source]¶

Return the yaml string for the Header item

Returns

Yaml string

Return type

str

class orsopy.fileio.base.ValueVector(x: Union[float, List[float]], y: Union[float, List[float]], z: Union[float, List[float]], unit: Optional[str] = 'dimensionless')[source]¶

Bases: orsopy.fileio.base.Header

A vector or list of vectors with an optional unit.

For vectors relating to the sample, such as polarisation, the follow is defined:

  • x is defined as parallel to the radiation beam, positive going with the beam direction

  • y is defined from the other two based on the right hand rule

  • z is defined as normal to the sample surface, positive direction in scattering direction

x: Union[float, List[float]]¶
y: Union[float, List[float]]¶
z: Union[float, List[float]]¶
unit: Optional[str] = 'dimensionless'¶
